title: 398: Being an ~Adult~ Entertainer & Raising a Family w/ Lena The Plug
itunes:title: 398: Being an ~Adult~ Entertainer & Raising a Family w/ Lena The Plug
description:
Today The Broads are joined by Lena Nersesian aka Lena The Plug! They chat about what she was like growing up, how she got into the business, her thoughts on 0nly F*ns, how Instagram has targeted adult entertainers, meeting her partner, her parents thoughts on her business, jealousy, 3some tips,  body image and postpartum struggles, pregnancy expectations and birth plans, being a parent in the industry, advice, and much more!

 

LENA NERSESIAN AKA LENA THE PLUG:

Follow Lena The Mom on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/lena.the.mom/
